name: BrainPower
description:
Brain Power is a multiplayer battle of words game.

You compete with other players and challenge them on their knowledge of the language.

GAME FEATURES

- relaxing game to play with your friends
- Create your own room and secure it with password if you want to play with friends
- Create your own game and challenge random players
- Define your own categories
- Stop button - when you are ready stop the game
- Chat wih players
- The quickest player who gets most unique words gets the best score!
